pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Java Naming and Directory InterfaceTM (JNDI) DSML v2.0 Service Provider
* DSML is Directory Services Markup Language. DSML v2.0 is an OASIS specification of a markup language for representing and accessing directory data. The specification defines both a SOAP/HTTP 1.1 binding and a file binding.
* The JNDI/DSML v2.0 service provider enable access to DSML v2.0 services that are implemented as a Web service over SOAP/HTTP 1.1 or as a static document (file).
